title: Epoch Eyewear Brodie Sport Golf Safety Sunglasses for Men or Women Polycarbonate Frame w/Amber Lens
features: Meets ANSI Z87.1 standards for use in industrial applications, our high-quality sports & motorcycle sunglasses have shatterproof polycarbonate lenses that can withstand any flying debris
With 100% UV400 filter, these mens sunglasses for golf and other sports provide complete protection against harmful UVA and UVB rays that are highly damaging to the eyes.

Coupled with a comfortable rubber nosepiece and shatterproof lenses mean these mens sunglass for golf will hold against whatever life throws at you. This also ensures a more comfortable, flexible, and secure fit for long-term wear.
Crafted in an aerodynamic wraparound design with black semi-frames, these sports & motorcycle riding glasses will surely have you cruising in style with maximum eye protection.

Equipped with amber lenses, also referred to as copper, brown or "HD", block blue light which helps to add depth perception. They are good for low-light conditions and block less sunlight than the smoke lens.
description: Epoch 1 is a classic, sporty frame featuring co-injected inlaid rubber that provides a non-slip fit comfortable for all day wear. The inlaid rubber not only optimizes comfort, but also improves the overall strength of the frame. Lenses are shatterproof polycarbonate and block 100% of UVA & UVB rays. Amber lenses, also referred to as copper, brown or "HD", block blue light which helps to add depth perception. They are good for low-light conditions and block less sunlight than the smoke lens. Epoch Eyewear is a Veteran owned and operated company. We are proud to be a part of the Veteran community and build a company that provides jobs and great products.
